titles.title: Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 3550) to authorize funds for Federal-aid highways, highway safety programs, and transit programs, and for other purposes.
Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 3550) to authorize funds for Federal-aid highways, highway safety programs, and transit programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-456, by Mr. Dreier.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 165.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-456, by Mr. Dreier.

The amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure now printed in the bill, modified by the amendments printed in part A of the report of the Committee on Rules accompanying this resolution, shall be considered as adopted in the House and in the Committee of the Whole.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 593.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 229 - 194 (Roll no. 105).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3550 (Transportation Equity Act: A Legacy for Users).
